data.title: About the medical center «Manufactura Clinic»
data.meta_description: Manufactura Clinic specializes in expert diagnosis and treatment in traumatology and orthopedics, neurosurgery, gastroenterology, proctology, and provides medical services in surgery, cardiology, therapy, pediatrics, endocrinology, neurology, urology, otolaryngology, ophthalmology, ophthalmology.
data.text:
I underwent radiation therapy, irradiation of the tonsils. I am very satisfied with the communication with the radiation therapist Oleg Hryhorovych (Dr. Yarmak Oleg Hryhorovych) and the conditions of the clinic. I was sent for the treatment by my oncologist, who had chosen the clinic because of the modern linac. The cost of radiation therapy is affordable to me, the prices are quite the same as in other cancer centers. And my special thank you for your attention to patients.

A very good clinic. Doctors and nurses are qualified. I visit it regularly, the staff is polite. I'm a patient of the clinic since the day it opened, never had any problems!

Special thanks to doctor Andriy Mateyko (ENT) - he is a professional in his field, I have never met a more qualified doctor!

(see: reviews about the doctors of the Manufactura Clinic in Google My Business)

In Manufactura clinic, we are undergoing cancer treatment for my father with doctor Viktoriya Georgievna Kosinova. The path is not easy: examinations, tests, consultations, chemotherapy courses. But the main thing is that there are positive results in treatment, which is very hopeful. The attitude of everyone the doctors and the entire staff is good. Thank you very much.

(see: feedback about the doctors of Manufactura Clinic in Google My Business)

I reсommend doctor oncologist Zadorizhnyi Bohdan Ihorovych. He carefully studied my documents and referred tothe further examination, which turned out to be decisive. I don't know how it will turn out in future to me, but I have already found my doctor.

(see: the feedback from the Manufactura Clinic page in Google My Business)

I would like to note the professionalism of surgeon Yevgeny Yuriyovych Burov!

The doctor is respectful, easy to communicate with, and most importantly, performs medical tasks very clearly, does not offer what you do not need. I recommend it to everyone I know, I even brought my mother) Everyone is satisfied.

Thank you

(see: feedback about the doctors of the Manufaсtura Clinic in Google My Business)

More than a half year ago, the Manufactura clinic was the only hospital, agreed to accept my mother in a very critical condition. Unfortunately, they could not save her, but I saw all the endeavor the doctors in resuscitation took to help her and they did not leave her for any minute.

I don't remember the names of all the doctors but I am grateful them all for all what was done, and for my mother had left without pain and in comfort with the good people behind.

I wish success to Manufactura Clinic!

(see: the feedback from the Manufactura Clinic page in Google My Business)

I was registered for pregnancy management at "Manufactura Clinic". It was not my first pregnancy, so I know what to compare. I am very grateful to Olena Stanislavivna Yavtushenko, because for the first time I was not intimidated with horror-stories for me and the baby and did not prescribe unnecessary tests and drugs. If there were any problems, the doctor explained what we were doing and why, and was constantly in touch to answer any my questions. I gave birth in another center, and the doctors there confirmed that the pregnancy management was correct, and the exchange documents were competently filled. I also needed a correction of iron-deficiency anemia before childbirth and I also got it at "Manufactura Clinic" by hematologist Viktoriya Georgiivna Kosinova. She raied hemoglobin quickly without using of aggressive iron injections (as it was recommended by several other hematologists in other centers).

Everything happened clearly, on time, and well-coordinated. Thank you!!!

(see: the feedback from the Manufactura Clinic page in Google My Business)

There is no better hematologist in Ukraine than Victoria Kosinova! She is God given doctor. I owe her my life, she was able to create a miracle for me. She is very attentive, even to small things, and she is not indifferent to other people's pain. THANK YOU!!!

(Feedback sent to the clinic's e-mail)

I'd like to share my impressions about radiation therapy, I underwent in the clinic on the recommendation of my clinical oncologist S.P. Odarchenko. and by the decision of the medical council. Nice new machine, the radiation therapist explained everything very clearly, as well as the effects that could be during the treatment. Very friendly administrators in the radiation therapy building. Thanks to the entire team of specialists!

I had a consultation with Odarchenko, Serhiy Petrovych, the doctor explained everything so clearly how the process develops and what and when it is better to do. He is very polite and competent, I'm glad he was recommended me by his patients from Vinnytsia. I also recommend him. I will take treatment only from him.

(The feedback received from our website)

I really want to thank my favorite gynecologist Olena Stanislavivna Yavtushenko for my girls, she managed my pregnancy, every visit was like a holiday! I have not seen the best maternity ward yet, everything is at the highest level! And whole my family visits the clinic because of the best doctors there!

(The feedback from our web-site)

I would like to express my great respect and gratitude to Mr. Wozniak Oleksandr Mykhailovych and to all the staff of his department. Last week they saved my life, saved my eyesight. An extremely complicated operation was performed to remove the giant pituitary adenoma. The operation is filigree. I want to say that Oleksandr Mykhailovych is a genius of neurosurgery. I wish you to live to 100 years, DOCTOR!

(The feedback from our web-site)
